description: Maryanne Chisholm is an acclaimed Surreal Painter & Illustrator. Her work has shown in Galleries Internationally and across the USA including at the Herberger Theater & Art Gallery in Scottsdale and Tempe, AZ, Milan Fashion Week with the #DressME MADS Milano Exhibition, and the Freedom of Arts exhibition in Denver, CO. In 2021 Maryanne was awarded the Collectors Vision Award, by Contemporary Curator Magazine, for completing a body of socially significant work.
